Class CarController

java.lang.Object
com.app.controller.CarController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/cars") public class CarController extends Object
REST controller for managing cars. Provides endpoints for creating, updating, retrieving, deleting, and sorting cars. Also includes filtering and statistics functionality related to cars.

  • Method Details

    • createCar

      @PostMapping @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public ResponseDto<Long> createCar(@RequestBody CreateCarDto createCarDto)
      Creates a new car and returns its ID.
      Parameters:
      createCarDto - Data required to create a car.
      Returns:
      ResponseDto containing the ID of the created car.

    • createCars

      @PostMapping("/all") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public ResponseDto<List<Long>> createCars(@RequestBody List<CreateCarDto> createCarDtos)
      Creates multiple new cars and returns their IDs.
      Parameters:
      createCarDtos - List of data required to create multiple cars.
      Returns:
      ResponseDto containing the list of IDs of the created cars.

    • findCarById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(FOUND) public ResponseDto<CarDto> findCarById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves a car by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the car to retrieve.
      Returns:
      ResponseDto containing the car data.

    • findAllCars

      @GetMapping @ResponseStatus(FOUND) public ResponseDto<List<CarDto>> findAllCars(@RequestParam List<Long> ids)
      Retrieves a list of cars by their IDs.
      Parameters:
      ids - List of car IDs.
      Returns:
      ResponseDto containing a list of car data.

    • deleteCarById

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<Long> deleteCarById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a car by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the car to delete.
      Returns:
      ResponseDto containing the ID of the deleted car.

    • deleteCarById

      @DeleteMapping @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<List<Long>> deleteCarById(@RequestParam List<Long> ids)
      Deletes multiple cars by their IDs.
      Parameters:
      ids - List of car IDs to delete.
      Returns:
      ResponseDto containing a list of deleted car IDs.

    • getSortedCarAsc

      @GetMapping("/sort") public ResponseDto<List<CarDto>> getSortedCarAsc(@RequestParam List<String> parameters, @RequestParam String direction)
      Retrieves a list of cars sorted by specified parameters and direction.
      Parameters:
      parameters - List of parameters to sort by.
      direction - Sorting direction ("asc" or "desc").
      Returns:
      ResponseDto containing a list of sorted car data.

    • getCarsWithSpeedBetween

      @GetMapping("/{minSpeed}/{maxSpeed}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<List<CarDto>> getCarsWithSpeedBetween(@PathVariable Integer minSpeed, @PathVariable Integer maxSpeed)
      Retrieves a list of cars with speed between specified minimum and maximum values.
      Parameters:
      minSpeed - Minimum speed.
      maxSpeed - Maximum speed.
      Returns:
      ResponseDto containing a list of cars within the speed range.

    • getCarsFiltersBy

      @PostMapping("/filter") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<List<CarDto>> getCarsFiltersBy(@RequestBody CarCriterionDto carCriterionDto)
      Retrieves a list of cars based on the specified filter criteria.
      Parameters:
      carCriterionDto - Filtering criteria for the cars.
      Returns:
      ResponseDto containing a list of cars that match the filter.

    • groupByColorAndAmount

      @GetMapping("/color") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<List<GroupByDto<Object>>> groupByColorAndAmount()
      Groups cars by color and returns the number of cars in each group.
      Returns:
      ResponseDto containing the grouped cars by color and their counts.

    • groupByAndAmount

      @GetMapping("/group/{map}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<List<GroupByDto<Object>>> groupByAndAmount(@PathVariable String map)
      Groups cars by the specified parameter and returns the number of cars in each group.
      Parameters:
      map - The parameter by which to group the cars (e.g., "color").
      Returns:
      ResponseDto containing the grouped cars and their counts.

    • groupByBrandAndMinMaxPriceStatistic

      @GetMapping("/statistic/price") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<List<GroupByAndPriceStatisticDto<Object>>> groupByBrandAndMinMaxPriceStatistic()
      Retrieves the price statistics (min, max, average) for cars grouped by a specified parameter.
      Returns:
      ResponseDto containing the price statistics.

    • groupByAndMinMaxPriceStatistic

      @GetMapping("/price/{map}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<List<GroupByAndPriceStatisticDto<Object>>> groupByAndMinMaxPriceStatistic(@PathVariable String map)
      Retrieves the price statistics (min, max, average) for cars grouped by a specified parameter.
      Parameters:
      map - The parameter by which to group the cars (e.g., "price").
      Returns:
      ResponseDto containing the price statistics.

    • priceSpeedStatistic

      @GetMapping("/price-speed") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<PriceSpeedStatisticDto> priceSpeedStatistic()
      Retrieves the price and speed statistics (min, max, average) for all cars.
      Returns:
      ResponseDto containing the price and speed statistics.

    • getCarsWithSortedComponentsNatural

      @GetMapping("/sort/components/{order}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<List<CarDto>> getCarsWithSortedComponentsNatural(@PathVariable String order)
      Retrieves cars sorted by components in a specified order (natural or custom).
      Parameters:
      order - The order to sort the cars (e.g., "asc" or "desc").
      Returns:
      ResponseDto containing the sorted cars.

    • getCarsWithSortedGroupComponentsNatural

      @GetMapping("/components/{order}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<List<ComponentsWithCarsDto>> getCarsWithSortedGroupComponentsNatural(@PathVariable String order)
      Retrieves cars grouped by components and sorted by the number of cars in each group.
      Parameters:
      order - The order to sort the groups (e.g., "asc" or "desc").
      Returns:
      ResponseDto containing the grouped cars by components.

    • getCarCloseToPrice

      @GetMapping("/close/{price}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<List<CarDto>> getCarCloseToPrice(@PathVariable BigDecimal price)
      Retrieves cars with a price close to a specified value.
      Parameters:
      price - The price to compare against.
      Returns:
      ResponseDto containing the cars close to the specified price.
